title: Propose xDollar integration into MCN Multiple Farming Ecosystem
body:
xDollar is a cross-chain decentralized stablecoin lending platform with DAO governance and multi-collateral first launched on Polygon and soon other chains. As the first project incubated by MCN Ventures, xDollar is proud to launch as the first key DeFI component as a stablecoin lending in the MCN ecosystem. 

Thus, we propose xDollar to be integrated into MCN Multiple Farming Ecosystem as a key resource for the stablecoin lending platform. We believe xDollar is a long-term key player that will empower MCN's vision as a multi-chain ecosystem incubator and investment.
author: 0x207dCfFf0bF605e892d7b036617FfF1A9B7a3038
